shortdesc.ph: Configures video screenshot and upload functionality.
Used to configure screenshot and upload functions.

section.p: The SDK uploads video screenshots and additional information to the Agora server. After the upload is complete, the Agora server sends callback notifications and additional information to your server.
Used to set parameters related to screenshot and upload.
section.note: Only one instance can be configured per functional module. Currently, only local screenshot upload is supported.

plentry.pd: Additional information about the video content (maximum length is 1024 bytes).

(Optional) Server configuration for uploading video screenshots via the Agora Extensions Marketplace. This parameter only takes effect when type in is set to CONTENT_INSPECT_IMAGE_MODERATION. To use this feature, please contact technical support.
Functional modules. You can configure up to 32 instances. See . Only one instance can be configured per functional module. Currently, only local screenshot upload is supported.
Number of functional modules, i.e., the number of configured instances. Must match the number of instances configured in modules. Maximum is 32.
0: (Default) No actual function. Do not set type to this value.
2: Captures and uploads video screenshots via Agora's self-developed extension. The SDK captures and uploads video sent by the local user.
3: Captures and uploads video screenshots via an extension plugin from the Agora Extension Marketplace. The SDK uses the plugin to capture and upload video streams in the channel.
Maximum number of function modules that can be configured is 32.

Additional information about the video content (maximum length: 1024 bytes). The SDK sends the screenshot along with the additional information to the Agora server. After the upload is completed, the Agora server sends the additional information and callback notification to your server.

(Optional) Server configuration used when uploading video screenshots via an extension from the Agora Extension Marketplace. This parameter takes effect only when type in is set to CONTENT_INSPECT_TYPE_IMAGE_MODERATION. Contact technical support to use this feature.

Function modules. Up to 32 instances can be configured. Valid range: [1, 32]. See . Each function module can only be configured with one instance. Currently, only local screenshot upload is supported.
Number of function modules, i.e., the number of instances configured. Must match the number of instances configured in modules. Maximum value is 32.
